article_title: John Kasich calls himself 'Our Only Hope' in 2016 election on Star Wars Day then drops out of presidential race
article_text:
04:09 Ted Cruz in Kansas City Saturday afternoon Pause

02:19 Kansas Democrats converge at caucus site

01:45 Supporters of Bernie Sanders line up in Kansas

01:45 Democrats turn out in droves for Kansas caucus

05:25 Protesters and Trump supporters clash in Kansas

02:21 Trump rallies early in Wichita, gets booed at the caucus

00:36 Early ejection at Donald Trump rally

01:26 Ted Cruz greets supporters in Wichita during Kansas caucus

01:41 Marco Rubio's rally in Wichita ahead of the Kansas caucus

01:15 Kansas Donald Trump supporter Dan McCarthy

article_metadata.news-keywords: John Kasich, Kasich, president, republican party, Hillary Clinton, Clinton, Hillary, Donald Trump, Trump, Star Wars, May the 4th, May 4, may the 4th be with you, twitter, tweet, election, 2016, elections, Republican, primary
article_metadata.description: Gov. John Kasich tweeted a Star Wars themed video early Wednesday making five predictions about a Hillary Clinton presidency and calling himself the only hope to stop it. In a few hours, he will drop out of the race for the presidency.
article_metadata.title: Kasich calls himself ‘only hope’ in Star Wars video - then drops out of presidential race | The Wichita Eagle
